title: Knowledge is Free! - Wiki - 0x00sec - The Home of the Hacker

data.author: haalim
data.speak: Knowledge is Power But like all power, there are those who want to keep it for themselves but em not one of them.I was feeling bored and I start checking my bookmarks and I found these linked in my bookmarks so I thought I should make a list and share with others because knowledge should be free . Please note that this is my first post here If there is something wrong with the post if I choose the wrong category do let me know.Penetration testing & Security relatedIntro Trusted ComputingFlow analysis and Network HuntingLive Overflow Web Hacking:AngularJS SecurityWeb User IdentificationAdvance Threat Tactics PlaylistCobalt Strike TrainingRed Team OperationsASU CSE 468 Computer Network Security F16Incident Investigation and Response LecturesIntroduction to Cryptography by Christof PaarYouTubeIntroduction to Cryptography by Christof PaarHere you can watch free videos of a two-semester intro course to cryptography. The 24 lectures give a comprehensive introduction to modern applied crypto. data.speak: This seems very similar to Forgâ€™s  Wiki and Your Complete, Unbudgeted Toolkit. Good content but a suggestion for the futureâ€¦ you can edit WiKis in the WiKi category. I believe this was done for this exact purpose. So yeahâ€¦â€“Techno Forgâ€“

data.author: oaktree

data.author: Cawa
data.speak: Many good links! Well done and thank you for sharing. oaktree:Oh, it looks like you have so many links in your post that my poor browser was not able to expand them fast enough.Maybe it would be better to remove the previews and have text links only - Atleast with this amount of content?! Text links only would also simplify, combining all the wikis around hereâ€¦if someone is willing to do soâ€¦(would be awesome)One big wiki - all the infos just a click aheadâ€¦ Forgâ€™s WikiYour Complete Unbudgeted ToolkitServices & ToolsUseful linksCS related BooksAbout the Wiki categoryWikiâ€™s are a great way to share information, make it open for people to edit, and contribute, and soon with many hands youâ€™ll have light work.Wikiâ€™s are also a much cleaner way of storing references, as they can be updated by anybody, and improved or added to, rather than just creating an endless stream of reference posts.So if all of them are editable, i could try to combine em if you like?! But that amount of content and links needs to be revised and put into categories and topics, this will take a few day

data.author: Techno_Forg
data.speak: Yeahâ€¦ the Wiki category allows the community to collaborate and edit the Wikis together. I havenâ€™t edited my wiki in a while and will add more links soon (been busy), butâ€¦ please feel free to combine some of the content and please give credit to those that deserve it.â€“Techno Forgâ€“
